sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RETIRADE ill fortification, a kind of retrenchment made in the body of a baſtion, or other work, which is to be diſputed, inch by inch, after the defences are diſmantled. It uſually confiſts of two faces, which make a re-entering angle, when a breach is made in a baſtion, the enemy may alſo make a retirade or new fortification behind it.
